drcl.inet.protocol.cbt
Class CBTStateTimer

java.lang.Object
  drcl.inet.protocol.cbt.CBTTimer
      drcl.inet.protocol.cbt.CBTStateTimer
public class CBTStateTimer
extends CBTTimer

State timer is the timer for a specific CBT state. It includes join-rtx-timer, join/transient-timeout and quit-rtx-timer.
